item.title: Faced with rising temps, Las Vegas is embracing a simple climate solution: More trees
item.description: Climate change is driving more dangerous summer heat across the U.S. Las Vegas, which reached 120 degrees last summer, is planting thousands of trees to help cool its hottest neighborhoods.
